attributes.action: make sure all pedophiles are jailed not looked after softly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In recent light the goverment are saying we shouldnt jail pedophiles we should look after them  this is absurd they should in in jail where they cant be a menace to society

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Fortheinnocence/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
